caption.p: Micrograph of a tapered long period grating TLPG with three micro-tapers. Taper 1 has a distorted profile. The fibre at position A is offset from the fibre axis compared to position B. The centre axis of the fibre is shown as a dashed red line. SM750 fibre was used (magnification Ã— 10); Reprinted with permission from [ 55]. Copyright 2018 Elsevier.
